title: WTB T206 PSA 3 or 4 HOF, Hindu, AB, etc.
author: Dustanh1

posts.post_title: WTB T206 PSA 3 or 4 HOF, Hindu, AB, etc.
posts.post_content: I've got about $200, looking for the best deal I can get on 1 T206 in PSA 3 or 4 grade.  I'm looking for a HOF, Cubs that I need, any Hindu back, American Beauty Back, or could possibly come up with extra cash for a Broad Leaf if it comes up.  Please post or email me scans and prices and I will get back to you asap.  Thanks!
